humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there is metastatic carcinoma in 1/23 axillary lymph nodes. This corresponds to N1 according to Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total). The report also specifies that this is level I, which is still within the N1 category.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is metastatic carcinoma in 1/23 axillary lymph nodes, which corresponds to pathologic N1 (pN1) according to the AJCC 7th Edition staging system. This is based on the fact that the patient has a single tumor deposit greater than 2.0 mm in at least one axillary lymph node.
